footer.description: Specialist in high-quality aluminum verandas and patio covers. Your reliable partner for outdoor living for more than 15 years.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Your partner for high-quality patio solutions

who.title: Who are we?
who.description1: We are a leading company specializing in providing stylish and durable patio solutions. We are proud to offer a wide range of high-quality products, including verandas, glass sliding walls and side walls, to transform your outdoor space into an oasis of comfort and beauty.
who.description2: Don't hesitate any longer and contact us today to request your quote. Together we will make your outdoor space a place where you can fully enjoy, regardless of the weather!

quality.title: Quality and craftsmanship
quality.description1: At VivaVerandas, we attach great value to quality and craftsmanship. Our products are manufactured with high-quality materials and innovative technologies, resulting in durable and reliable solutions. Our dedicated and experienced team members are always ready to advise and guide you in making the best choices for your specific situation.
quality.description2: We strive for customer satisfaction and take on every challenge with enthusiasm. From the first contact to installation and aftercare, we strive to provide excellent service and build a long-term relationship with our customers.

banner.title: Discover our timeless and elegant patio solutions
banner.description: Make your outdoor space shine with our stylish verandas and glass sliding walls, which add a timeless and elegant appearance to your home.

custom.title: Custom patio solutions
custom.description: At VivaVerandas we believe in customization. We design and create patio solutions that perfectly match your specific wishes, so you can enjoy an outdoor space that is completely yours.

experience.title: Improve your outdoor experience
experience.description: Our high-quality patio solutions enhance your outdoor experience, so you can enjoy outdoor living in all seasons to the fullest.

protection.title: Comfort and protection
protection.description: Our patio solutions not only provide comfort, but also protect you from weather and wind, so you can enjoy your outdoor space without worries.

oasis.title: Create Your Outdoor Oasis
oasis.description: At VivaVerandas we strive to transform your outdoor space into an oasis of comfort, style and elegance. With custom patio solutions and high-quality products, we make your dream project a reality. Request a quote today and discover the possibilities for your unique outdoor environment.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Only the best materials and craftsmanship

cta.title: Ready to get started?

hero.title: Veranda
hero.description1: A veranda is the ideal choice for those looking for a durable and stylish patio cover. Enjoy plenty of natural light and protection from rain and wind with our high-quality verandas.
hero.description2: At VivaVerandas, we deliver your veranda completely tailored to your needs. Within 3 weeks, our veranda builders ensure fast delivery and professional installation.

benefits.title: Benefits of a veranda
benefits.description: Our verandas are robust and low-maintenance, with excellent protection against weather influences.

whyUs.title: Why choose VivaVerandas?
whyUs.description: At VivaVerandas you choose quality and durability. Our verandas are strong and low-maintenance.

personalize.title: Personalize your veranda
personalize.description: Every veranda can be personalized with options such as LED lighting, sun protection and side walls.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Discover our easy step-by-step guide for your veranda.

q1.question: Is a permit required to install a patio cover?
q1.answer: In most cases no permit is required if the cover meets certain conditions. Contact us for advice on permits in your municipality.

q2.question: How long does a patio cover last?
q2.answer: Our verandas last for years with minimal maintenance. With proper care you can count on a lifespan of 20+ years.

q3.question: Are your patio covers resistant to all weather conditions?
q3.answer: Yes, our products are designed for the Dutch climate and resistant to rain, wind, snow and UV radiation.

q4.question: How long does it take to install a patio cover?
q4.answer: Within 3 weeks we ensure delivery and professional installation. The installation itself usually takes 1-2 days.

q5.question: Can I expand my veranda later with extra options?
q5.answer: Yes, our verandas are modularly designed. You can easily add LED lighting, side walls or sliding doors later.

q6.question: Do you offer financing options?
q6.answer: Yes, we work with various financing partners. Ask about the possibilities during your personal consultation.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: Do you have questions or would you like to make an appointment? Please feel free to contact us!

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: VivaVerandas respects your privacy and ensures that the personal information you provide to us is treated confidentially.

section2.title: 2. Data we collect
section2.content: We collect data that you provide to us, such as name, address, email address and telephone number when you contact us or request a quote.

section3.title: 3. Use of data
section3.content: Your data is used to process your request, send quotes and deliver our services.

section4.title: 4. Retention period
section4.content: We do not keep your data longer than necessary for the purpose for which it was collected.

section5.title: 5. Your rights
section5.content: You have the right to view, correct and delete your data. Please contact us for this.

section6.title: 6. Contact
section6.content: For questions about our privacy policy, you can contact us via info@vivaverandas.nl

section1.title: Article 1 - Definitions
section1.content: In these terms VivaVerandas means: the company located in Reuver, registered with the Chamber of Commerce under number 90086449.

section2.title: Article 2 - Applicability
section2.content: These conditions apply to all offers and agreements of VivaVerandas.

section3.title: Article 3 - Quotes
section3.content: All quotes are non-binding and valid for 30 days, unless otherwise stated.

section4.title: Article 4 - Delivery
section4.content: The delivery time is determined in consultation and is indicative.

section5.title: Article 5 - Warranty
section5.content: VivaVerandas offers 10 years warranty on the construction under normal use.

section6.title: Article 6 - Payment
section6.content: Payment is made in accordance with the payment terms stated on the invoice.

cookieBanner.title: We value your privacy
cookieBanner.description: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience, display personalized advertisements or content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies.
cookieBanner.preferencesIntro: We use cookies to help you navigate efficiently and perform certain functions. You will find detailed information about all cookies under the relevant consent category below.
cookieBanner.necessaryDesc: Necessary cookies are crucial for the basic functions of the website and without them, the website will not function as intended. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable data.
cookieBanner.functionalDesc: Functional cookies help perform certain functionalities, such as sharing website content on social media platforms, collecting feedback, and other third-party features.
cookieBanner.analyticalDesc: Analytical cookies are used to understand how visitors interact with the website. These cookies help provide information about visitor statistics, bounce rate, traffic source, etc.
cookieBanner.performanceDesc: Performance cookies are used to understand and analyze key performance indices of the website, helping to deliver a better user experience for visitors.
cookieBanner.advertisingDesc: Advertising cookies are used to deliver personalized advertisements to visitors based on previously visited pages and to analyze the effectiveness of advertising campaigns.

section1.title: What are cookies?
section1.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website.

section2.title: Which cookies do we use?
section2.functionalDesc: Necessary for the functioning of the website.
section2.analyticalDesc: To gain insight into the use of the website.

section3.title: Managing cookies
section3.content: You can block or delete cookies via your browser settings.

section4.title: Contact
section4.content: Questions about our cookie policy? Contact us via info@vivaverandas.nl

cta.title: Make an appointment
cta.subtitle: Plan your visit to our showroom

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find answers to the most frequently asked questions

q1.question: How long does delivery of a veranda take?
q1.answer: The average delivery time is 3-4 weeks after placing your order. This may vary depending on the type of veranda and any custom options.

q2.question: What does a veranda cost?
q2.answer: The price of a veranda depends on the type, dimensions and chosen options. Request a no-obligation quote for an exact price quote.

q3.question: How long does installation take?
q3.answer: Installation takes an average of 1-2 days, depending on the size and complexity of the veranda.

q4.question: Is there a warranty on the veranda?
q4.answer: Yes, we offer 10 years warranty on the construction and 5 years on moving parts such as motors.

q5.question: Do I need a permit?
q5.answer: In most cases a veranda is permit-free provided it meets certain conditions. We will advise you on this during the consultation.

q6.question: Can I install the veranda myself?
q6.answer: We recommend having the installation carried out by our professionals for optimal results and to maintain warranty.

q7.question: Which colors are available?
q7.answer: Our verandas are available in many standard colors. In addition, any RAL color is possible as a custom option.

q8.question: Can I add lighting and heating?
q8.answer: Yes, we offer various options for built-in LED lighting and patio heating.

q9.question: How do I maintain my veranda?
q9.answer: An aluminum veranda is virtually maintenance-free. Occasional cleaning with water and a soft cloth is sufficient.

q10.question: Do you also come to my area?
q10.answer: We install verandas throughout the Netherlands. Contact us to discuss the possibilities.

info.title: What is a Polycarbonate Veranda?
info.description1: A polycarbonate veranda is the ideal choice for anyone looking for a durable and affordable patio cover. Thanks to the strong and clear polycarbonate roof panels, you enjoy plenty of light without compromising on protection from rain and wind.
info.description2: At VivaVerandas, we deliver your polycarbonate veranda completely customized to your needs. Within 3 weeks, our veranda experts ensure fast delivery and professional installation.

specs.title: Specifications
specs.frameColorsValue: Anthracite, white, cream or RAL color

cta.title: Interested in a Polycarbonate Veranda?
cta.description: Request a free quote or make an appointment for personalized advice

info.title: What is a Glass Veranda?
info.description1: A glass veranda offers maximum light entry and an unobstructed view of your garden. Tempered glass is safe, strong and easy to clean.
info.description2: At VivaVerandas, we only use high-quality tempered glass that meets all safety standards.

hero.title: Louvered Veranda
hero.subtitle: Adjustable sun protection for optimal comfort

info.title: What is a Louvered Veranda?
info.description1: A louvered veranda offers ultimate flexibility. The rotating louvers allow you to adjust sunlight and ventilation exactly as you wish, from fully open to completely closed.
info.description2: Perfect for those who want maximum control over light and shade throughout the day.

specs.title: Specifications
specs.warrantyValue: 10 years on construction, 5 years on motor

info.title: What is a Folding Roof Veranda?
info.description1: A folding roof veranda combines protection with flexibility. The fabric can be electrically opened and closed, so you decide when you want to sit under the open sky.
info.description2: Ideal for those who want the best of both worlds: protection when needed, open air when desired.

specs.title: Specifications
specs.warrantyValue: 10 years on frame, 5 years on fabric

cta.title: Interested in a Folding Roof Veranda?

info.title: What is a Glass Sliding Wall?
info.description1: A glass sliding wall transforms your veranda into a wind-free outdoor room. The panels slide easily to the side for maximum ventilation.
info.description2: The perfect addition to your existing veranda or canopy.

cta.title: Interested in a Glass Sliding Wall?

hero.title: Cube Veranda
hero.subtitle: Sleek modern design for your garden

info.title: What is a Cube Veranda?
info.description1: The Cube veranda is the pinnacle of modern design. With straight lines and a minimalist appearance, this perfect cube fits into any modern garden.
info.description2: Freestanding or attached to the house, the Cube always makes an impression.

hero.title: Garden Room
hero.subtitle: Enjoy your garden all year round

info.title: What is a Garden Room?
info.description1: A garden room is a fully enclosed veranda where you can enjoy your garden all year round, regardless of the weather.
info.description2: Perfect as extra living space, workspace or hobby room with a garden view.

info.title: What is a Carport?
info.description1: An aluminum carport protects your car from rain, snow, hail and UV rays. Stylish and durable, a valuable addition to your home.
info.description2: Completely custom-made for one or more cars.

cube.title: Cube Veranda
cube.subtitle: Modern design for a timeless outdoor space
cube.mainTitle: The Cube Veranda: Sleek & Modern Design
cube.description1: The Cube Veranda is the perfect combination of contemporary design and ultimate outdoor comfort. With its characteristic clean lines and flat roof, this canopy fits perfectly with modern architecture. Thanks to the high-quality aluminum construction, you are assured of a durable and low-maintenance solution that will last for years.
cube.description2: At VivaVerandas, we design and install your Cube Veranda completely custom-made. Whether you choose a minimalist design or a fully equipped outdoor space with LED lighting, glass sliding walls and sun shading: we deliver a solution that is both practical and elegant. Within a few weeks, you will enjoy your new luxury outdoor space, including professional installation and finishing.
cube.benefitsTitle: Experience the unique benefits of a Cube Veranda
cube.benefit1: Sleek, modern design with flat roof for a timeless appearance
cube.benefit2: High-quality aluminum frame, resistant to all weather conditions
cube.benefit3: 100% custom made, perfectly matching your home
cube.benefit4: Integrated LED lighting for atmospheric evenings
cube.benefit5: Combinable with glass sliding walls for a garden room
cube.whatIsText: A Cube Veranda from VivaVerandas is a modern aluminum canopy with a sleek, minimalist design. The flat roof and straight lines create a contemporary appearance that seamlessly connects to modern homes. The durable construction offers protection from sun and rain while you optimally enjoy your outdoor space.
cube.whyChooseText: The Cube Veranda is ideal for those who love a sleek, modern look. The robust aluminum construction is low maintenance and lasts for years. With the many expansion options such as LED lighting, sun shading and glass walls, you create your ideal outdoor space.
cube.customizeText: Complete your Cube Veranda with various options such as integrated LED spots, electric screens, glass sliding walls or side panels for extra shelter. Choose from different RAL colors to perfectly match the canopy to your home.
cube.installationText: Our experienced craftsmen ensure a quick and professional installation of your Cube Veranda. Whether you choose a freestanding setup or an extension to your home, we offer flexible placement options that suit your situation.
cube.specMaterial: High-quality aluminum, powder coated in any RAL color
cube.specRoofValue: Insulated roof panels or glass roof
cube.specWidthValue: Up to 7 meters without intermediate posts

lamel.title: Louvered Veranda
lamel.subtitle: Luxury, comfort and complete control over your outdoor space
lamel.mainTitle: The Louvered Veranda: Ultimate Comfort & Flexibility
lamel.description1: A louvered veranda is the perfect combination of luxury, comfort and control over your outdoor space. Thanks to the electrically adjustable louvers, you determine the ideal amount of sunlight, ventilation and shade, perfectly tuned to every season. This modern aluminum louvered canopy offers protection from sun, rain and wind, so you can enjoy your terrace all year round.
lamel.description2: At VivaVerandas, we design and install your louvered veranda completely custom-made. Whether you choose a freestanding louvered canopy in the garden or an extension to your home with integrated sun shading: we deliver a solution that is both practical and elegant. Within a few weeks, you will enjoy a durable aluminum canopy with louver roof, including professional installation and finishing.
lamel.benefitsTitle: Experience the unique benefits of a louvered veranda
lamel.benefit1: Adjustable louvers (0° - 135°) for perfect control over light and shade
lamel.benefit2: 100% watertight when louvers are closed - enjoy outdoors even in the rain
lamel.benefit3: Electric operation with remote control or smartphone app
lamel.benefit4: Automatic rain sensor for worry-free outdoor enjoyment
lamel.benefit5: Integrated water drainage through the posts
lamel.benefit6: Atmospheric LED lighting between the louvers possible
lamel.benefit7: Combinable with screens, glass sliding walls and side panels
lamel.whatIsText: A louvered veranda from VivaVerandas offers the perfect combination of style, comfort and functionality for your outdoor space. Thanks to the adjustable louvers, you can easily regulate the amount of sunlight and ventilation, ensuring you always have a pleasant outdoor environment. Our high-quality aluminum constructions are weather-resistant and durable, ideal for any climate.
lamel.whyChooseText: Louvered canopies offer unique flexibility because you can tilt the louvers to the desired position. Enjoy optimal shade, maximum light or complete shelter from rain. The aluminum louvers are low maintenance and resistant to various weather conditions, allowing you to enjoy carefree for years.
lamel.customizeText: Complete your louvered veranda with various options such as integrated LED lighting, glass sliding walls or side panels for extra shelter. You can choose from different colors and dimensions to perfectly match the canopy to your home.
lamel.installationText: Our experienced craftsmen ensure a quick and professional installation of your louvered veranda. Whether you choose a freestanding setup or an extension to your home, we offer flexible and efficient placement options that suit your situation.
lamel.affordableText: The price of a louvered veranda depends on the dimensions and chosen extensions, such as LED lighting, side panels or sliding panels. Yet this type of canopy remains a smart and stylish choice. Request a free quote to discover what it costs for you.
lamel.specMaterial: Aluminum louvers and frame, powder coated in any RAL color
lamel.specControlValue: Electric with remote control or app (Somfy)
lamel.specGuaranteeValue: 5 years on motor, 10 years on construction

glazen.title: Glass Veranda
glazen.subtitle: Maximum natural light, maximum outdoor feeling
glazen.mainTitle: The Glass Veranda: Light, Luxury & Space
glazen.description1: A glass veranda is the perfect way to transform your outdoor space into a bright, luxurious living environment. The high-quality laminated safety glass provides an elegant appearance and gives your garden or terrace a spacious feeling. Thanks to the transparent roof, you enjoy maximum daylight while remaining protected from rain and wind.
glazen.description2: At VivaVerandas, we design your glass veranda completely custom-made. The glass roof can be fitted with sun-resistant or self-cleaning glass, so you can comfortably stay outside even on warm days. The robust aluminum support structure is durable, low-maintenance and available in any RAL color. This way you create an outdoor space that perfectly matches your home.
glazen.benefitsTitle: Experience the benefits of a glass veranda
glazen.benefit1: Maximum natural daylight through the transparent glass roof
glazen.benefit2: Tempered VSG safety glass for optimal safety
glazen.benefit3: Sun-resistant glass keeps the space cool on warm days
glazen.benefit4: Self-cleaning glass coating for minimal maintenance
glazen.benefit5: Luxurious, timeless appearance that increases your home's value
glazen.benefit6: Durable aluminum support structure, corrosion resistant
glazen.benefit7: Combinable with sun shading, screens and glass sliding walls
glazen.whatIsText: A glass veranda from VivaVerandas is an aluminum canopy with a transparent glass roof. By using high-quality safety glass, you enjoy maximum daylight while being protected from rain and wind. The glass veranda is the ideal choice for those who love a bright, open outdoor space.
glazen.whyChooseText: A glass veranda offers the best of both worlds: the shelter of a canopy and the feeling of being outside. The transparent roof creates a bright atmosphere and makes your outdoor space visually larger. The robust aluminum construction lasts for years with minimal maintenance.
glazen.customizeText: Complete your glass veranda with various options such as sun shading, integrated LED lighting, glass sliding walls or electric screens. Choose from clear, sun-resistant or self-cleaning glass and select the perfect RAL color for your aluminum frame.
glazen.installationText: Our experienced installers place your glass veranda quickly and professionally. Whether it's an extension to your home or a freestanding construction in the garden, we ensure a perfect finish and watertight connection.
glazen.specFrameValue: Aluminum, powder coated in any RAL color
glazen.specWidthValue: Up to 6 meters without intermediate posts
glazen.specGuaranteeValue: 10 years on construction, 5 years on glass

polycarbonaat.title: Polycarbonate Veranda
polycarbonaat.subtitle: Affordable quality for every budget
polycarbonaat.description1: A polycarbonate veranda is the ideal choice for those looking for a quality canopy with excellent value for money. The multi-chamber polycarbonate roof panels are translucent, insulating and virtually unbreakable. You enjoy protection from sun and rain without sacrificing daylight.
polycarbonaat.description2: At VivaVerandas, we deliver polycarbonate verandas completely custom-made. The high-quality aluminum construction is durable and low-maintenance, while the polycarbonate panels provide excellent thermal insulation and reduced rain noise. Available in various colors, from clear to opal, bronze or grey. This way you always find the perfect look for your home.
polycarbonaat.benefit1: Excellent value for money - luxury appearance, competitive price
polycarbonaat.benefit2: Translucent material for a pleasant atmosphere
polycarbonaat.benefit3: Superior thermal insulation thanks to multi-chamber structure
polycarbonaat.benefit5: UV resistant with 10 year factory guarantee
polycarbonaat.benefit6: Reduced rain noise for extra comfort
polycarbonaat.benefit7: Lightweight construction, suitable for various situations
polycarbonaat.whatIsText: A polycarbonate veranda is an aluminum canopy with multi-chamber polycarbonate roof panels. This plastic material is lighter than glass, but many times stronger and offers excellent insulation. It is the perfect choice for those seeking comfort and quality without exceeding their budget.
polycarbonaat.whyChooseText: Polycarbonate is a smart choice for those who want the best for the best price. The panels are UV resistant, impact resistant and offer good thermal insulation. Moreover, polycarbonate significantly reduces rain noise, allowing you to sit outside peacefully even during a shower.
polycarbonaat.customizeText: Every polycarbonate veranda is custom made for your specific situation. Choose the desired dimensions, panel color (clear, opal, bronze or grey) and RAL color for the aluminum frame. Optionally you can extend the veranda with side panels, screens or LED lighting.
polycarbonaat.installationText: Our professional installers place your polycarbonate veranda efficiently and carefully. The lightweight material makes installation faster than other roof types, resulting in lower installation costs and less disruption.
polycarbonaat.affordableText: A polycarbonate veranda is the most affordable option without compromising on quality. The combination of durable aluminum and high-quality polycarbonate panels ensures a canopy you will enjoy for years.
polycarbonaat.specFrameValue: Aluminum, powder coated in any RAL color
polycarbonaat.specWidthValue: Up to 8 meters without intermediate posts

plateReplace.metaDescription: Request a quote for polycarbonate plate replacement. Free measurement within 70 km of Reuver.

plateReplace.subtitle: Multi-wall polycarbonate plates in various colors.

form.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

steps.step1Desc: Free measurement within 70 km of Reuver
steps.step3Desc: You choose from different types of polycarbonate plates
steps.step4Desc: We ensure professional installation within 3 weeks

info.whyTitle: Why you should replace polycarbonate plates on time
info.whyText1: Polycarbonate roof plates last for years, but over time they can discolor, show small cracks or even start leaking. This affects not only the appearance, but also the quality of your veranda or carport. By replacing your polycarbonate roof plates on time, you prevent damage and enjoy a sleek, clear and light-transmitting roof that looks like new.
info.whyText2: At VivaVerandas we provide fast and professional replacement, usually within 3 weeks, including free measurement within 70 km of Reuver. We use only high-quality clear or opal polycarbonate and install everything with precision and craftsmanship. This way you are assured of a durable result that you will enjoy for years to come.
info.forTitle: Polycarbonate plate replacement for every cover
info.forText2: It doesn't matter what brand your current cover is: we can provide almost any system with new polycarbonate plates.
info.areaText: We are active in Limburg, Noord-Brabant and parts of Gelderland. In your area? Then we will come for free measurement and you will receive a non-binding quote quickly.

success.title: Thank you for your request!
success.text1: We have received your quote request for polycarbonate plate replacement.
success.text2: We will contact you within 24 hours.
